entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
